```{r, echo=FALSE}

# filter out only pharma
ilo <- readRDS("iloemp_2020_final.rds")
ilo <- subset(ilo,ind.code=="21")

  renderPlotly({

# subset the data accoding to the input:
  dr <- reactive({ilo %>%
                  filter(variable %in% input$variable,
                         country %in% input$country)
      }) 

# make the plot
  ggplotly(  
          ggplot(dr(),aes(x = year, y = value, group = country, colour = country)) +
          geom_line()
      )
    
  })

```
